Uses of Class
org.faceless.pdf2.OptionalContentDescriptor

  • Packages that use OptionalContentDescriptor 
    Package Description
    org.faceless.pdf2
    Contains the classes used to create a PDF document

    • Uses of OptionalContentDescriptor in org.faceless.pdf2

      Subclasses of OptionalContentDescriptor in org.faceless.pdf2 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  OptionalContentLayer
      This class represents an optional content layer in the PDF.
      Methods in org.faceless.pdf2 that return OptionalContentDescriptor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static OptionalContentDescriptor OptionalContentDescriptor.and​(OptionalContentDescriptor a, OptionalContentDescriptor b)
      Create a Descriptor which will enable the canvas with BOTH descriptors A and B are enabled
      OptionalContentDescriptor PDFAnnotation.getOptionalContentDescriptor()
      Return the OptionalContentDescriptor previously set by PDFAnnotation.setOptionalContentDescriptor(org.faceless.pdf2.OptionalContentDescriptor)
      OptionalContentDescriptor PDFCanvas.getOptionalContentDescriptor()
      Return the OptionalContentDescriptor previously set by PDFCanvas.setOptionalContentDescriptor(org.faceless.pdf2.OptionalContentDescriptor)
      static OptionalContentDescriptor OptionalContentDescriptor.not​(OptionalContentDescriptor a)
      Create a Descriptor which will enable the canvas when descriptor a is NOT enabled.
      static OptionalContentDescriptor OptionalContentDescriptor.or​(OptionalContentDescriptor a, OptionalContentDescriptor b)
      Create a Descriptor which will enable the canvas with EITHER of descriptors A and B are enabled
      Methods in org.faceless.pdf2 with parameters of type OptionalContentDescriptor 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static OptionalContentDescriptor OptionalContentDescriptor.and​(OptionalContentDescriptor a, OptionalContentDescriptor b)
      Create a Descriptor which will enable the canvas with BOTH descriptors A and B are enabled
      static OptionalContentDescriptor OptionalContentDescriptor.not​(OptionalContentDescriptor a)
      Create a Descriptor which will enable the canvas when descriptor a is NOT enabled.
      static OptionalContentDescriptor OptionalContentDescriptor.or​(OptionalContentDescriptor a, OptionalContentDescriptor b)
      Create a Descriptor which will enable the canvas with EITHER of descriptors A and B are enabled
      void PDFAnnotation.setOptionalContentDescriptor​(OptionalContentDescriptor descriptor)
      Set the optional content descriptor that this annotation belongs to.
      void PDFCanvas.setOptionalContentDescriptor​(OptionalContentDescriptor descriptor)
      Set the OptionalContentDescriptor on this canvas, which can be a OptionalContentLayer or a logical expression containing several layers.
